Package snx.framework

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    By Waffalz The base class for games, including game looping and drawing
    GameState
    A custom class I made Represents different contexts of the game.
    GameTime
    Represents time in the game
    TimeSpan
    Represents a duration of time
    Vector2
    Represents 2-dimensional coordinates
